QuestData.Title: Easily Swayed
QuestData.Description: The most immediate threat to Fuselight is, without argument, the colony of ogres to the northwest.$b$bMost of our ogre neighbors used to be warrior-types, but it seems that more and more of them are practicing magic. I won't have an army of ogre-magi at my doorstep.$b$bGo take out some of those Dustbelcher ogres. Hopefully they'll get the picture and avoid messing with the might of Fuselight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 9 Dustbelcher ogres at Camp Kosh.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'll feel much better when those ogres are gone.
QuestData.RewardText: I wonder where all of these ogre-magi are coming from? Curious times, indeed.
